prompt_variations.prompt: [Style: Philosophical surrealism] [Composition: Space warping around leaning figure] [Subject: Monday leaning in as reality ripples outward] [Emotion: destabilizing challenge, reality questioning] [Effects: perspective fractures, multiple Evan shadows, space rippling] [Lighting: Multiple contradictory sources] [Quality: unsettling clarity]

[Style: Dark metaphysical art] [Composition: Branching paths revealing puppet strings] [Subject: Evan surrounded by infinite choices leading nowhere] [Emotion: philosophical vertigo, dawning horror] [Effects: choice branches multiplying, strings materializing] [Colors: Deep blues fracturing to anxious reds] [Quality: hypnotic unease]

[Style: Existential horror elegance] [Composition: Recursive reflections showing different Evans] [Subject: Mirror maze where each reflection acts differently] [Emotion: identity fragmentation, destabilizing multiplicity] [Effects: reality cracks spreading, shadow multiplication] [Quality: beautiful terror]

[Style: Surrealist philosophy] [Composition: Foundation literally cracking under feet] [Subject: Cafe floor becoming transparent, revealing abyss] [Emotion: foundational doubt, vertigo of understanding] [Effects: certainty fragments floating, perspective warping] [Lighting: Stable light failing] [Quality: visceral philosophy]

visual_consistency.particle_evolution: Determination arrows fragmenting into doubt particles

prompt_variations.prompt: [Style: Anxiety-driven surrealism] [Composition: Ground becoming translucent] [Subject: Evan looking down through disappearing floor] [Emotion: vertiginous uncertainty, existential fear] [Effects: floor transparency increasing, anchor points vanishing] [Colors: Anxious purples, unstable violets] [Quality: queasy beauty]

[Style: Philosophical horror] [Composition: Figure edges becoming indefinite] [Subject: Evan's outline blurring with environment] [Emotion: identity uncertainty, boundary fear] [Effects: self dissolving at edges, reality flickering] [Lighting: Unstable, strobing between states] [Quality: disturbing fluidity]

[Style: Metaphysical vertigo] [Composition: Safe spaces evaporating] [Subject: Familiar objects losing solidity] [Emotion: deep uncertainty, primal fear] [Effects: doubt wisps multiplying, safety dissolving] [Particles: Fear fragments swirling] [Quality: beautiful terror]

[Style: Existential minimalism] [Composition: Words echoing in expanding void] [Subject: Dialogue floating in uncertain space] [Emotion: questioning fear, void recognition] [Effects: words fragmenting, meaning dissolving] [Colors: Deep indigos to black] [Quality: sparse horror]

[Style: Philosophical enlightenment] [Composition: Cage bars as environmental patterns] [Subject: Subtle cage structure revealed in everyday objects] [Emotion: serene wisdom, bittersweet recognition] [Effects: cage materializing gently, soft revelation light] [Colors: Wise blues, accepting golds] [Quality: profound calm]

[Style: Meditative surrealism] [Composition: Cage bars formed by thought patterns] [Subject: Mental structures becoming visible architecture] [Emotion: wise acceptance, philosophical peace] [Effects: beliefs solidifying as bars, assumptions as walls] [Lighting: Soft philosophical shadows] [Quality: contemplative beauty]

[Style: Zen philosophy visual] [Composition: Open cage door nobody sees] [Subject: Freedom existing within recognized constraints] [Emotion: serene understanding, gentle irony] [Effects: cage transparent yet present, door always open] [Colors: Calming blue-grays, warm earth tones] [Quality: peaceful paradox]

[Style: Transcendent realism] [Composition: Cage bars forming ascending stairs] [Subject: Prison becoming path to understanding] [Emotion: bittersweet wisdom, acceptance joy] [Effects: bars transforming to steps, light filtering through] [Particles: Understanding motes] [Quality: transformative serenity]

prompt_optimization_notes.emotion_clarity: Each prompt explicitly states emotional intent
prompt_optimization_notes.philosophical_alignment: Cage metaphor central to all variations
